name: Angel Food Cake
author: Annita Layton
instructions: Measure and sift together 3 times cake flour and 3?4 cup plus 2 tablespoon sugar. Beat together with wire whip until foamy egg whites, cream of tarter, and salt. Beat in two tablespoons at a time 3?4 cup sugar (beat about 10 seconds after each addition). Beat until stiff peaks form. Sift three tablespoons flour mixture at a time over whites and fold in (8 to 10 folds). Fold in 1 1?2 teaspoons vanilla (about 10 folds). Fold 8 to 10 more times. Ease batter into pan and cut through with a knife. Bake at 375Â° 30 to 35 minutes. Invert and cool. Chocolate Angel Food Cake: Substitute 1/4 cup cocoa for 4 cup flour.
